data.message: NO!!!! I DO NOT LIKE IT!!! I would like for you guys to stop changing things all the time.. just when ppl (I) get use to it you ppl change it... I would also like for there to be an option so I can decide if I want something changed , NOT YOU!!!  I don't care what status or pictures or pages my "friends" like or comment on and I definitely hate that they see every single thing I like or comment on and what's the point of having my page private if their friends get to see what they're commenting on if they're commenting on my page.. It's annoying , it's all around annoying.. You guys just keep altering things that don't need any altering .. LEAVE IT ALONE ALREADY!!

replies.message: THANK YOU This is what I have been saying for yrs...leave it alone. We used to be able to rearrange our albums in the photo sections which I loved and now we cant....STOP MAKING CHANGES THAT ARENT REQUESTED....But not that our complaining will do anything they will keep changing it dispite what anyone thinks so why even ask us how we feel about it....
AGREE with all comments.  Especially DO NOT LIKE the font!!
Yeah, the font is horrible.
I think things keep changing simply to give people a job to do... their job is to try to improve things that are already working just fine... But, seriously, if it ain't broke, don't fix it!!!
amen
I agree do not like the font either!
Couldn't have said it any better myself. Thanks Yvette Reyes.
You're welcome Debbie Rhodes.. :)
I hate to say it. Refresh and change like Madonna.
Nadine, albums? I had a lot of photos on my page in my albums and 75% of them are gone. :(

I think the new design looks too cartoon-y lol & half my news feed isn't even things I'VE liked, it's recommended ads or other pages, which it okay in moderation. I feel like it's to much now. & to be honest the new chat thing I find is harder to use then before. Just my 2-cents :P
my dad always said "if its not broken, don't fix it". Like it the way it was.
Nadine, that is the one thing I really miss being able to do, rearranging the photo albums.  I wrote to fb numerous times about that!
AND notice... FACEBOOK is only responding to POSITIVE comments!!!  Yvette Reyes... THANK YOU  you said it perfectly!!!!
I agree with Yvette Reyes!!

Yes Tonia I definitely did see that facebook is not addressing every comment, they're  only addressing the ones that are applauding this stupid unnecessary change, smh... But you're welcome Tonia .. Doris I'm glad many of you feel the same way I do.
agree with all other comments   do not like it
Not at all..... nothing I asked for or wanted, but that seems to be the theme anymore..... someone else ALWAYS seems to know more of what we want & like than we do.
http://www.specialprezzi.com/department/112/Elettronica-ed-Accessori.html#a_aid=k744w&a_bid=04e28bba

Yvette Reyes, I agree.  The changes are like software companies coming out with new versions of this that and the other thing..  Just because it's different, it's not necessarily better.  If you're going to change something, make it BETTER.  If it's merely different, why put the customers through the hassle, right?
